text: The Chesapeake and Ohio F Class 4-6-2 was a class of 78 American 4-6-2 type steam locomotives built for the Chesapeake and Ohio Railroad from 1902-1926/1934 . In 1946-1947 following World War 2 5 locomotives were rebuilt as Class L1 4-6-4’s and one is preserved after the 1950’s .
title: Chesapeake and Ohio F Class 4-6-2
